meanings.sent1: My phone is offline, so I can't check my messages.
meanings.sent2: The computer is offline, so I can't browse the web.
meanings.sent3: The offline computer seemed to be taking a break from the online world.
meanings.sent4: Being offline is like being in a quiet room away from the noisy internet.
meanings.sent5: I remember the offline days when we used to read books instead of scrolling endlessly.

meanings.definition: In a state of not being actively involved or participating.
meanings.sent1: She felt offline during the meeting and didn't contribute much.
meanings.sent2: He prefers to stay offline during group discussions.
meanings.sent3: The offline student was daydreaming about being a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her mind went offline as she stared out the window lost in thought.
meanings.sent5: The offline team member seemed lost in their own world, disconnected from the task at hand.
